## Vectors, lists & data frames 
```{r}
# Create a vector 
vec_1 <-c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)
vec_1
class(vec_1)
typeof(vec_1)

#Access 3rd element 
vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e3

#Access 1st element
vec_1_e1 <-vec_1[1]
vec_1_e1

# Access 5th through 7th element
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
vec_1_e5to7

#Reassign vec_1 as character

vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1)
vec_1_char
```
```{r}
#Create a new vector
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara",
          location = "Rincon", 
          swell = "south")
class(vec_2)

#Access second element
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
vec_2_e2
```
```{r}
#Create a data frame

df_1 <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "A", "D"), 
                   species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray whale"), 
                   count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))
df_1

class(df_1)
class(df_1$species)
max_count <-max(df_1$count)
max_count
  
```
